page.title: 16A TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: {Sunday}I wake up at about 7 o clock a.m.but I stay in bed until 7.30 when my Dad brings me a cup of tea.I get up and dress and go into the kitchen for breakfast.Afterwards I go out into the garden to feed the rabbits.We have a large garden with lots of flowers.Then I go to Sunday school to help teach the young children. They learn about Jesus and prophets from small books.At 12.00 I return home for dinner, usually roast beef, potatoes and Yorkshire pudding.In the afternoon we go to visit my parent's friends,or my friends visit me. We play board games and listen to records or we go out to play tennis or go on a bike ride around Balderton.After tea, which is usually at 5.00 I watch television and then have a bath, get my books ready for school and go to bed at 9.00 p.m.
